name: Viscream
description:
This game is made for the Games Now Online Jam #8

The theme was "scream" and games should have used some sort of AI-made assets.

Just screamed and try to balance your volume to the playing music. The more score you get the painting will look cooler! (or not?)

The Idea of the game came from ChatGPT and all different versions of The scream painting are from Midjourney.
